entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
